name: Siren Head In The Woods
description:
Hey This is my first game and i hope you like it

Story:

Group of friends gone missing after a camping trip, The local police sent you an investigator to take a look at the case, you arrived at the camping site to find that the last time seen is deep in the woods and here your journey starts.

Note:Please, if you find any problem or bug with the game or even have any suggestion to improve please write it in the comment and Thanks <3
